short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A game similar to Tetris, but with progression. The game has 12 levels, as well as a sandbox mode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A game with comfort controls, similar to Tetris, but with passing.
The game has 12 levels, as well as a sandbox mode in which you can pass the time when all the levels are completed.

The goal of each level is to remove all lines with blue cells. To remove a line, you need, just like in Tetris, to completely fill it.
Controls: Hold down the left mouse button or touch the screen to start moving the shape, and release when you determine the final position of the shape.
